Key Match Events: Jameson Taillon allowed only one run in six innings and the Chicago Cubs beat the New York Yankees 2-1 to avoid a series sweep.
I. Paredes singled to center, Bellinger scored and Swanson scored, Tauchman to third.
Volpe hit sacrifice fly to left, Chisholm Jr. scored.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was held at Wrigley Field with an attendance of 39,364.
The game lasted 2 hours and 18 minutes.
